 facebook is seeking a release to production engineer to join our hardware engineering team .  come learn about our cutting edge power and hardware architecture ,  which has one of the most efficient infrastructures in the industry .  our servers and datacenters are the foundation upon which our rapidly scaling infrastructure efficiently operates and upon which our innovative services are delivered .  the intern / co - op will work closely with power ,  server ,  and data center engineering design teams to help design ,  qualify ,  and optimize our hardware power devices .  this position is located in our menlo park office .  release to production  ( rtp )  is the core validation team for all hardware that gets deployed at our data centers and we are looking for skilled and self - initiating hardware validation interns .  students majoring in electrical ,  mechanical ,  computer ,  or mechatronics are encouraged to apply .  understanding of server architecture is a definitive advantage .  applicants must be familiar with linux and bash ,  we use centos .  we will be focusing on students who show strong self - initiatives and are able to complete tasks with little guidance  ( we don t like to micro - manage )  .  basic programming experience is a must ,  we will have preference for students with python experience .  responsibilities will include debugging of hardware failures ,  running tests ,  working with our vendors / odms / oems and supporting the team .  projects will be assigned based on experience and interests .  travel may be asked of you but it s not a requirement .  if you like to solve problems ,  are efficient and have good communication skills ,  please apply  interface with hardware ,  mechanical ,  power ,  thermal and software engineers to understand system architecture .   drive hardware optimizations by creating hardware ,  thermal ,  and mechanical test plans for server hardware .   execute tests according to plan ,  while keeping a through procedural record and data log .   create automated test infrastructure ,  through the use of scripted languages and remotely controlled test equipment .   develop and publish test reports and communicate findings to team members .   diagnose and root cause component failures .      
 facebook is seeking an experienced administrative assistant .  this position is full - time and located in our menlo park ,  california headquarters .  coordinate internal and external meetings for multiple executives  manage hectic and complex calendars  prepare expense reports  coordinate both domestic and international travel arrangements  organize space planning and large offsite events  general office duties as needed  build cross - functional relationships between departments      
 facebook is seeking a systems engineering intern to join our release to production team .  our servers and data centers are the foundation upon which our rapidly scaling infrastructure efficiently operates and upon which our innovative services are delivered .  the co - op will work closely with our hardware ,  validation ,  production engineering ,  and data center teams to provision ,  image ,  validate ,  and deploy hardware that is delivered to facebook’s data centers .  this position is located in our menlo park office .   interface with hardware ,  validation ,  software ,  and data center engineers to understand system deployment ,  provisioning ,  and imaging .   develop automation around testing and deploying software packages to facebook’s server fleet .   support the data center in break / fix and sustaining activities .   test and validate new drivers and firmware for components and new system kernels .   develop processes to monitor systems ,  perform data collection ,  and maintenance methodologies .   diagnose and root cause component failures .      
 the global help desk is the primary group responsible for providing user - facing support to users through site - specific walkup locations and our global remote help desk .  the help desk service lead is responsible for operational execution and ensuring adverse trends in the quality of service delivery & support are constantly improved through the actionable use of data .  this is a full - time position based in our main office in menlo park ,  ca .    required to manage through influence on a recurring basis ,  working with other teams .    constantly maintains operational awareness of how help desk team ( s )  are doing overall through regular and deep understanding of defined metrics .    responsible for task management and assignments for help desk techs   monitors and unblock help desk performance through review and analysis of kpi s and issues .    seeks out feedback from help desk techs to optimize support delivered  ( either in person or remotely )  and maintain a good understanding of general user support needs and requirements  (   voice of the customer   )    uses advanced methods for the systematic isolation of issues ,  identification of root cause ,  and definition of technical solutions .    constantly identifies and takes action based on operational metrics and problem trends .    responsible for the quality and measuring success of on - boarding new technicians .

 strong c coding experience  -  experience with software development in linux  -  a strong understanding of scalable algorithms  job category   software engineering  primary location   usa - pennsylvania ,  philadelphia  full / part time   full time  job type   student / intern  regular / temporary   temporary  posting date   sep 17 ,  2013  apply before  ongoing  business group employees in the intel architecture group  ( iag )  deliver innovative platforms across computing and communication segments including data centers ,  mobile and desktop personal computers ,  handhelds ,  embedded devices and consumer electronics .   intel s industry leading technology is used to create integrated hardware and software solutions such as processors ,  chipsets ,  communication radios ,  graphics processors ,  motherboards ,  and networking components that deliver capabilities from security and manageability to computing performance and energy efficiency .   iag employees are at the forefront of enabling a new era of computing that is more integrated into all aspects of our daily lives .   the intel fabric software development team is looking for a software development intern to work in our king of prussia design center to facilitate the delivery of the next generation intel fabric products for high performance computing  ( hpc )  .   hpc is being used today to help solve some of the world s most challenging scientific needs ,  including fusion energy ,  bio - medical research ,  physics ,  as well as traditional engineering such as aeronautic and automotive engineering .   the king of prussia design center is focused around the fabric management and io stack needs of large scale hpc and datacenter fabrics .   this includes configuring routing ,  qos ,  congestion control and security for all ports and switches in the fabric .   it also includes the development of io protocols ,  io stacks and apis .  given the sizes of hpc fabrics and the performance requirements ,  there are many unique challenges to solve .   the student will be exposed to a variety of leading edge technologies including   -  development of hpc fabric technologies enabling the construction of the largest hpc systems in the world .   with server counts ranging from 100 to 10 , 000s servers in a single fabric potentially all working on a single computational application .   -  the latest high performance server cpus and systems  -  configuration management and software engineering for very large scale products and projects encompassing 10s of millions of lines of code .   posting statement   intel does not discriminate based on race ,  color ,  religion ,  gender ,  national origin ,  age ,  disability ,  protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by local law ,  regulation ,  or ordinance .  more info at www . intel . com / jobs .

 undergrad intern technical  -  717877 description job description  in this position ,  you may be involved with one or more of the following  1 )  validation engineering interns are responsible for finding logic bugs present in the microprocessor design via simulation and formal methods .  knowledge of digital logic design ,  software engineering ,  and computer architecture are preferred .  on the job you will learn other skills such as modeling techniques and verification methodologies .  core responsibilities include ,  but are not limited to   -  analyzing microarchitectural features to identify possible problem areas  -  designing ,  running ,  and debugging tests ,  and analyzing possible fixes  -  writing software to provide controllability and observability into the architectural model  -  the creation and optimization of the validation environment ,  tools ,  capabilities ,  and methodologies 2 )  logic design engineering interns are responsible for rtl coding and microarchitecture design on leading edge intel processors .  candidates will work within a large ,  highly experienced team of engineers where both collaboration and individual problem solving are required and encouraged .  core responsibilities include   -  working with experienced logic designers to assist in defining functionality and delivering rtl that meets the project requirements  -  working with validation engineers to insure correct functionality of the design  -  working with circuit design engineers to meet timing ,  power ,  and area constraints 3 )  test technology engineering interns develop and execute structural automatic test pattern generation  ( atpg )  and / or functional test generation solutions for next generation microprocessors .  responsibilities include tool & flow development and deployment to maximize fault coverage and test quality ,  facilitate low coverage debug & diagnosis ,  and minimize test development and application costs .  activities also include test pattern generation and validation and working with the product development team to debug and characterize product .  qualifications you must possess the below minimum qualifications to be initially considered for this position .  preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum requirements and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidates .  experience listed below would be obtained through a combination of your school work / classes / research and / or relevant previous job and / or internship experiences .  minimum qualifications   -  must be pursuing a bs degree in computer science ,  computer engineering ,  and / or electrical engineering and a minimum cumulative gpa of 3 . 0 .   -  must have the unrestricted right to work in the us without requiring sponsorship validation interns  useful courses and skills include c++ and object oriented programming ,  data structures and algorithms ,  digital logic ,  computer architecture ,  assembly language ,  and familiarity with hardware description languages .  logic design interns  useful courses and skills include hardware description languages such as verilog / vhdl ,  logic simulators ,  perl ,  computer architecture ,  and knowledge of circuits and validation .  test technology interns  useful courses and skills include knowledge of digital logic ,  vlsi circuit design ,  and computer architecture .  knowledge of perl ,  c++ ,  hdl ,  and assembly language programming desired .  exposure to digital systems testing ,  testable design ,  or design - for - test  ( dft )  principles a plus .  job category  engineering primary location  usa - california ,  folsom full / part time  full time job type  student / intern regular / temporary  temporary posting date  aug 18 ,  2013 apply before  aug 18 ,  2014 business group employees in the intel architecture group  ( iag )  deliver innovative platforms across computing and communication segments including data centers ,  mobile and desktop personal computers ,  handhelds ,  embedded devices and consumer electronics .  intel s industry leading technology is used to create integrated hardware and software solutions such as processors ,  chipsets ,  communication radios ,  graphics processors ,  motherboards ,  and networking components that deliver capabilities from security and manageability to computing performance and energy efficiency .  iag employees are at the forefront of enabling a new era of computing that is more integrated into all aspects of our daily lives .  posting statement  intel does not discriminate based on race ,  color ,  religion ,  gender ,  national origin ,  age ,  disability ,  protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by local law ,  regulation ,  or ordinance .  more info at www . intel . com / jobs .

 job description   be an integral part of driving the global strategies & solutions of intel s award winning supply chain .  intel corporation has exciting technology manufacturing engineering  ( tme )  internship opportunities for graduate students .  as a member of the tme team ,  you will be a full business partner ,  making and influencing business decisions that optimize intel s supply chain .   the scope of technology manufacturing engineering  ( tme )  engagement follows the equipment life cycle .  first engagement begins 3 - 4 generations upstream to ensure a healthy ecosystem and provide investment and collaboration support to component research activities .  our level of engagement increases through pathfinding ,  development ,  and hvm ramp phases .  after successful process transfer from td to manufacturing ,  tme provides sustaining support for upgrades ,  spares ,  service ,  technical training and end - of - life management .   interns will undertake a project designed to utilize existing skills and experience and provide an opportunity for professional growth .  additionally ,  the tme intern program includes practical training and educational events ,  networking / social opportunities ,  and exposure to senior leadership .  intern projects are unique to the specific business need ,  but responsibilities and analyses may include   -  environmental social governance  -  equipment workforce capability  -  capital planning and procurement  -  quality management  /  systems  -  fatory ramp and risk mitigation  -  controls  rponsibilities may be quite diverse and are exempt non -  at intel ,  we believe that the best mba graduates can develop into some of the future leaders of our company .  that s why we created the accelerated leadership program ,  a chance for you to collaborate with senior leaders and managers on some of the biggest strategic opportunities and challenges facing our company .  you will immediately put your creativity ,  education ,  and experience to work in three high - impact ,  high - visibility rotations that will challenge your creativity and innovative thinking ,  test your experience ,  and allow you demonstrate your capabilities ,  while delivering on specific goals established for you .  in this position ,  you will be right in the center of the technology that s changing the lives of people around the world ,  supporting not only our relentless focus on building the best microprocessors ,  but driving our business toward new multibillion - dollar growth opportunities in consumer electronics ,  mobile devices ,  services ,  and software .   your responsibilities will include   -  three 8 - month rotations through various business groups with a final placement role that matches your career interests and skills upon completion of the program .   ( rotations may include ,  but are not limited to ,  business and market development ,  strategic planning ,  product marketing ,  corporate marketing ,  finance ,  manufacturing ,  operations ,  field sales .  )   -  a focus on solving real problems while gaining insight into intel s business strategy ,  operations ,  and leadership .   - participation in a training curriculum specially designed to accelerate your growth and development as a leader  qualifications  you must have   -  job description  process technology development engineer defines roadmaps to meet requirements ,  goals and milestones for a new technology process .  defines and establishes flow ,  procedures ,  and equipment configuration for the module .  selects and develops material and equipment for the process to meet quality ,  reliability ,  cost ,  yield ,  productivity and manufacturability requirements .  plans and conducts experiments to fully characterize the process throughout the development cycle .  drives improvements on quality ,  reliability ,  cost ,  yield ,  process stability / capability ,  productivity and safety / ergonomic over variables such as material ,  method ,  equipment ,  environment and operating personnel .  develops solutions to problems utilizing formal education ,  statistical knowledge ,  and problem - solving tools .  establishes process control systems for the process module and sustains the module through volume ramp .  develops strategy to resolve difficult problems and establishes systems to deal with these problems in the future .  trains production / receiving process engineers for transfer to other factories .  transfers process to high volume manufacturing and provide support in new factory start - up as well as install and qualification of the new production lines .  process td engineers in the logic technology development reliability group are part of technology development and manufacturing network responsible for defining reliability requirements and ensuring components achieve company objectives .   your responsibilities may include but not be limited to   - designing and executing experiments to determine the necessary parameters for reliability model development and validation .   - developing new acceleration techniques and analytical tools to assure the early identification of potential reliability problems with new products ,  packaging ,  boards ,  and manufacturing processes .   - developing risk assessments and making quality and reliability predictions based on data that you will collect using statistical principles and design of experiments fundamentals  - evaluating materials ,  properties and techniques used in production from a reliability standpoint .   - creating reliability design layout rules and specifications .   - advising design engineering on selection ,  application and test of electronic components and systems .   - collaboration with cross functional teams to solve technical  /  reliability issues during technology development and ramp to high - volume manufacturing .   - recommending process technology certification evaluation and acceptance criteria .   - recommending material ,  design or test methods and statistical process control procedures for achieving required levels of product reliability .   - partners may include logic technology development  ( ltd )  ,  wafer fab manufacturing and test  ( fsm )  ,  assembly & test technology development  ( attd )  ,  assembly and test manufacturing  ( atm )  ,  intel custom foundry  ( icf )  ,  and partners within intel s customer quality network  ( cqn )  focused on product ,  development ,  and manufacturing reliability .   qualifications  qualifications  you must possess the minimum qualifications to be considered for this position .  preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum qualifications and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidates .  experience can be obtained through a combination of prior education ,  current ph . d .  course work ,  projects ,  research and any relevant prior job / internships .   minimum qualifications  this is an entry level position for a college graduate with a ph . d .  degree in electrical engineering ,  material science ,  physics or related discipline .   preferred qualifications   - experience in experimental design ,  execution ,  and interpretation .   - experience with electron device fabrication and characterization .   - experience with electrical measurement equipment in characterizing electron devices  ( e . g .  hp4155 ,  oscilloscope ,  etc .  )   - experience with a range of analytical techniques such as sims ,  eel ,  edx ,  xps ,  auger ,  acoustic profiling ,  ftir ,  afm ,  etc .   - experience with various lab imaging techniques  ( sem ,  fib ,  tem ,  etc .  )   - knowledge in one or more of the following areas electron device fabrication ,  semiconductor device physics ,  cmos transistor level circuit design ,  interconnect reliability ,  soft error rate and circuit simulations ,  pcb fabrication principles ,  surface mount assembly ,  board test methods ,  solder and laminate material behavior under mechanical or thermo - mechanical conditions .   - knowledge of semiconductor wafer fabrication process and process integration challenges .   - knowledge of silicon and packaging assembly integration ,  or pcb technology operations  - understanding of reliability failure statistics ,  physics ,  or failure mechanisms .   - experience programming with formal language  ( c , c++ ,  c# ,  etc .  )  and scripting language  ( awk ,  perl ,  python ,  sql ,  tcl ,  vbscript ,  etc .  )   - experience with sequel or sql data extraction .   - experience with statistical analysis packages  ( e . g .  sas ,  jmp ,  minitab ,  r ,  etc .  )   - prior intel intern or scholarship recipient  job category   engineering  primary location   usa - oregon ,  hillsboro  full / part time   full time  job type   college graduate  regular / temporary   regular  posting date   sep 16 ,  2013  apply before  may 31 ,  2014  business group as the world s largest chip manufacturer ,  intel strives to make every facet of semiconductor manufacturing state -  logic technology development reliability engineer  -  719752 description job description  process technology development engineer defines roadmaps to meet requirements ,  goals and milestones for a new technology process .  defines and establishes flow ,  procedures ,  and equipment configuration for the module .  selects and develops material and equipment for the process to meet quality ,  reliability ,  cost ,  yield ,  productivity and manufacturability requirements .  plans and conducts experiments to fully characterize the process throughout the development cycle .  drives improvements on quality ,  reliability ,  cost ,  yield ,  process stability / capability ,  productivity and safety / ergonomic over variables such as material ,  method ,  equipment ,  environment and operating personnel .  develops solutions to problems utilizing formal education ,  statistical knowledge ,  and problem - solving tools .  establishes process control systems for the process module and sustains the module through volume ramp .  develops strategy to resolve difficult problems and establishes systems to deal with these problems in the future .  trains production / receiving process engineers for transfer to other factories .  transfers process to high volume manufacturing and provide support in new factory start - up as well as install and qualification of the new production lines .  process td engineers in the logic technology development reliability group are part of technology development and manufacturing network responsible for defining reliability requirements and ensuring components achieve company objectives .  your responsibilities may include but not be limited to   - designing and executing experiments to determine the necessary parameters for reliability model development and validation .   - developing new acceleration techniques and analytical tools to assure the early identification of potential reliability problems with new products ,  packaging ,  boards ,  and manufacturing processes .   - developing risk assessments and making quality and reliability predictions based on data that you will collect using statistical principles and design of experiments fundamentals  - evaluating materials ,  properties and techniques used in production from a reliability standpoint .   - creating reliability design layout rules and specifications .   - advising design engineering on selection ,  application and test of electronic components and systems .   - collaboration with cross functional teams to solve technical  /  reliability issues during technology development and ramp to high - volume manufacturing .   - recommending process technology certification evaluation and acceptance criteria .   - recommending material ,  design or test methods and statistical process control procedures for achieving required levels of product reliability .   - partners may include logic technology development  ( ltd )  ,  wafer fab manufacturing and test  ( fsm )  ,  assembly & test technology development  ( attd )  ,  assembly and test manufacturing  ( atm )  ,  intel custom foundry  ( icf )  ,  and partners within intel s customer quality network  ( cqn )  focused on product ,  development ,  and manufacturing reliability .  qualifications qualifications  you must possess the minimum qualifications to be considered for this position .  preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum qualifications and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidates .  experience can be obtained through a combination of prior education ,  current ph . d .  course work ,  projects ,  research and any relevant prior job / internships .  minimum qualifications  this is an entry level position for a college graduate with a ph . d .  degree in electrical engineering ,  material science ,  physics or related discipline .  preferred qualifications   - experience in experimental design ,  execution ,  and interpretation .   - experience with electron device fabrication and characterization .   - experience with electrical measurement equipment in characterizing electron devices  ( e . g .  hp4155 ,  oscilloscope ,  etc .  )   - experience with a range of analytical techniques such as sims ,  eel ,  edx ,  xps ,  auger ,  acoustic profiling ,  ftir ,  afm ,  etc .   - experience with various lab imaging techniques  ( sem ,  fib ,  tem ,  etc .  )   - knowledge in one or more of the following areas electron device fabrication ,  semiconductor device physics ,  cmos transistor level circuit design ,  interconnect reliability ,  soft error rate and circuit simulations ,  pcb fabrication principles ,  surface mount assembly ,  board test methods ,  solder and laminate material behavior under mechanical or thermo - mechanical conditions .   - knowledge of semiconductor wafer fabrication process and process integration challenges .   - knowledge of silicon and packaging assembly integration ,  or pcb technology operations  - understanding of reliability failure statistics ,  physics ,  or failure mechanisms .   - experience programming with formal language  ( c , c++ ,  c# ,  etc .  )  and scripting language  ( awk ,  perl ,  python ,  sql ,  tcl ,  vbscript ,  etc .  )   - experience with sequel or sql data extraction .   - experience with statistical analysis packages  ( e . g .  sas ,  jmp ,  minitab ,  r ,  etc .  )   - prior intel intern or scholarship recipient job category  engineering primary location  usa - oregon ,  hillsboro full / part time  full time job type  college graduate regular / temporary  regular posting date  sep 16 ,  2013 apply before  may 31 ,  2014 business group as the world s largest chip manufacturer ,  intel strives to make every facet of semiconductor manufacturing state - growth and to help deliver on that mission .  we need people that can come in and deliver results that have foundational impact to our global talent organization .  if you’re ready to roll up your sleeves and help us transform the world ,  our company ,  and yourself  consider joining us this summer .  the global talent organization at linkedin offers an array of challenging positions in a dynamic and collaborative environment .  we develop ,  drive ,  and maintain strategies for managing all aspects of the employee experience .  linkedin is seeking interns to work within core functions of the global talent organization .  responsibilities  this internship experience will allow individuals to apply the knowledge and skills learned in the classroom to real - world human resource experiences .  this internship opportunity is a great way to gain exposure to core hr functions ,  such as training & development ,  hrit ,  recruiting ,  talent management ,  compensation and employee relations .  as an intern the responsibilities could vary based on the area in hr to which you are assigned .  some of these responsibilities could include  assist with different aspects of recruiting  ( posting jobs ,  resume and candidate screening ,  etc )  • support the new employee orientation process ,  including on - boarding • report and analyze data for different projects • collect and evaluate business program metrics • schedule and prepare various training sessions • aid with organizing ,  creating and executing alumni ,  internal and summer internship activities • research best practices and strategies for use of technology • assist with analytics  ( analyze statistics ,  data ,  presentations ,  etc .  )  • execute other projects and duties as needed • report on experience to hr leadership team at the end of the internship skills  • strong collaboration skills and ability to work effectively with diverse people • strong analytical thinking and problem solving skills • balances corporate ,  function ,  geographic and business needs in deploying hr programs to the business unit .  • demonstrates courage and willingness to take risks to deliver results .  • leverage previous hr experience to help us build a world class hr organization • ability to work in a fast - paced team environment • intellectual curiosity and an ability to translate ideas into action • strong research and analytical skills • solid organizational and interpersonal skills • strong attention to detail requirements  preferred majors include human resources or business administration .  other disciplines will be considered previous hr internship or work experience is a plus must have the right to work legally and permanently in the us

management role .  experience with sql a plus .  depending on the role ,  experience in marketing ,  product ,  or sales at a technology company is preferred .  must have the right to work legally and permanently in the us

  ?  return to previous search results log in | job cart  (  0  )   platform engineering intern  location  us -  nc ,  raleigh req #  18420 talent area  product development / engineering preferred experience  entry level preferred education  not indicated apply add to job cart  position summary platform engineering intern what’s citrix sharefile ?  if you haven’t heard ,  citrix sharefile is the most exciting data sharing and synchronization technology for businesses .  sharefile allows you to create a secure space in the cloud where you can exchange business files with customers easily and securely .  you can email large files ,  conduct a secure file transfer or set up a collaboration space for project - related files .  sharefile plays a key role in the citrix mission of enabling mobile work styles .  what’s in it for you ?  this is a fun and fast paced environment .  if you like to write code ,  get things done ,  be challenged with tough problems and love to work with smart people ,  this is a place where you will have a lot of fun .  in between tackling challenging product problems ,  you might be indulging in x - box game face - offs while munching on free snacks .  this is a great place to gain experience in a cutting - edge technology company that would set you apart from other graduates .  what might you be working on ?  the platform engineering team is responsible for providing a rest based user api that abstracts sharefile data for a multitude of consumers – enabling mash - ups ,  and mobile clients .  the team focuses on ensuring the reliability ,  performance ,  and high availability of the mission critical account data and metadata .  you will join the team in the development ,  test ,  and maintenance of this software .  here are some examples of the things you might be working on     implement code for small features & bug - fixes    implement sample & test programs to exercise the platform software  ( including rest api )     work on prototypes with guidance from developers  implement time - saving infrastructure improvements by leveraging new tools & technologies  qualifications and requirements what are you bringing to the table ?  responsibilities preferred locations are basking ridge ,  nj the primary focus of this position will be to provide legal support for verizon’s strategic sourcing transactions .  the sourcing and supply chain organization is responsible for contracts with a value of over $30b annually .  verizon depends on the organization to help reduce expenses by more than $1 . 5b a year ,  to increase margin and to maximize shareholder value .  the organization is a leader in the focus on “one verizon” ,  as it has responsibilities for sourcing transactions for corporate and all lines of business .  lawyers who support the organization have a unique vantage point to learn and understand the business goals and strategic imperatives .  position responsibilities include the following  draft ,  negotiate and review sourcing contracts and provide advice on complex commercial transactions .  advise senior management on commercial transactions ,  to include providing advice and guidance on complex contract issues and appropriate risk allocation for strategic and core business transactions .  provide advice and guidance on compliance issues related to sourcing and procurement matters .  ensure that the business is viewing the implications of contracts from an end to end perspective ,  and to understand how each contract fits into the company’s strategic imperatives .  coordinate with other in - house counsel on a wide variety of issues related to verizon’s sourcing activities .  ability and professional maturity to balance business and contract goals against legal ,  business ,  policy and reputational risks ,  and to have the judgment to make reasoned decisions to take appropriate risks .  qualifications law degree from an accredited law school .  excellent academic performance in law school .  active member in good standing of at least one state bar .  8+ years of recent ,  relevant ,  proven legal experience with a law firm and / or ina ?  ? house with a company .  experience in a corporate legal department preferred .  demonstrated strong interpersonal and senior management relationship skills .  solid background in commercial contracting  ( drafting ,  reviewing and negotiating complex contracts )  including experience in the areas of software licensing ,  equipment resale ,  technology outsourcing ,  information security and / or privacy .  thorough understanding and knowledge of contract and business law .  thorough understanding of the telecommunications or technology industries .  excellent written and verbal communication skills are mandatory .  must be extremely detail - oriented and possess strong organizational and multia ?  ? tasking skills .  energetic ,  self - starter with a strong sense of ownership and involvement is critical .  positive attitude and good judgment .  equal employment opportunity we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .

 responsibilities  locations  walnut creek ,  ca  at verizon ,  our people are busy changing the world—tackling the toughest challenges in areas like healthcare ,  energy ,  public safety ,  and education .  with an outward focus on our customers and integrity at our core ,  we re creating technology solutions that help businesses optimize their operations ,  families connect from anywhere ,  and whole communities leave smaller ,  greener footprints .  the result ?  widespread impact on the way people live ,  work and play across the entire globe .   that’s why we need the best and the brightest minds to join our team .  people like you— determined to push boundaries ,  drive real change ,  and help us create a smarter ,  better future for all .   a verizon entry level role will give you a chance to channel your drive and enthusiasm .  it will be an experience that puts you front and center ,  allowing you to be hands - on and contributing your creative energy to high - impact projects from the moment you arrive .  and because we know the value of your education ,  we pay you for the talent and solutions you bring to the table .   our entry level engineering roles offer you the opportunity to be involved in meaningful work and projects .  you ll work alongside the best technical minds in the industry and have a unique opportunity to use your business and technical knowledge and skills in an environment dedicated to maintaining industry superiority .  you will be introduced to cutting edge tools and resources that will help you grow both professionally and personally .  verizon is continually recognized for its best in class technical training programs that prepare engineering team members to engage with the latest technologies .  your work will influence exciting and challenging projects such as new product development ,  machine - to - machine technology ,  cloud computing ,  technical operations ,  and fios .   qualifications  qualifications for success     a bachelor’s degree in computer science ,  electrical engineering ,  computer engineering ,  or equivalent major   3 . 0 gpa or greater preferred   solid computer programming training and a master knowledge with c / c++ ,  java and matlab   strong analytical skills and solid communication skills   strong computer skills in ms office  ( especially excel )    enthusiasm and eagerness to learn  preferred qualifications     familiarity with r ,  pig and hive a plus   a solid foundation in machine learning ,  statistical analysis ,  large scale computation technology   previous related internship / work experience preferred  candidates are encouraged to apply by going to www . verizon . com / campus .   candidates must create an application and apply in order to be considered .   our recruiters will review your application for available opportunities at verizon .  if a possible match is identified ,  a recruiter will contact you to further discuss your skills and professional interests .   equal employment opportunity  we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .   we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .      
   responsibilities   retail leadership development program  ( rldp )  operations  you’ll begin your journey at verizon wireless in a retail store operations role learning the essential skills for success ,  such as  voice products and data knowledge ,  inventory and financial controls ,  solid customer relationship development ,  accountability and compliance for customer transactions .  sales  after learning the essentials ,  you’ll be able to grow your earning potential in a sales position ,  where you’ll be responsible for  managing and exceeding quota / revenue targets ,  demonstrating equipment functions and network capability ,  proposing solutions that best benefit the company and the customer ,  ensuring customer satisfaction with every sale ,  retaining customer business ,  renewing contracts ,  presenting data solutions ,  and offering accessories designed to enhance the verizon wireless experience .  leadership  finally ,  you will have the opportunity to showcase your selling skills in a supervisory role .  here you’ll be required to  monitor daily store results to ensure sales ,  retention ,  and objective compliance ,  supervise ,  educate and motivate a team of sales reps .  to exceed quota goals ,  comply with necessary merchandizing requirements ,  complete monthly reporting and prepare for quarterly audits .    qualifications   our ideal candidate will bring the following qualifications    bachelor’s degree in retail management /  business management   leadership skills  ( student groups ,  internships ,  work ,  etc .  )    minimum 3 . 0 gpa   strong interpersonal ,  verbal ,  and communication skills   proficiency in microsoft office suite   ability to analyze customer needs ,  present solutions and add value through delivery of products and services   work well in a fast - changing environment that requires a high degree of multi - tasking   effective sales ,  negotiation and closing skills   flexible work schedule ,  including nights and weekends   ambition ,  energy ,  and a desire to achieve and succeed   bilingual skills are a plus if you’re ready to achieve and motivate others to do the same—a top performer looking to prove yourself—verizon wireless is the place for you .    equal employment opportunity   we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .  we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .  we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .  job id  326275

   responsibilities   joining verizon’s team puts you at the intersection of the latest communication ,  technology ,  and information sharing trends .  at verizon ,  we value the ideas ,  enthusiasm ,  and ambition that you bring .  we  ll expect you to take ownership of your job ,  your projects ,  and your career .  our entry level roles within the finance operations organization ,  offers you the opportunity to become a leader in finance at verizon  be involved in meaningful work / projects  be exposed to daily business operations  attend learning programs and training sessions .  you  ll learn from the best minds in the industry and have a unique opportunity to use your finance knowledge and skills in an environment dedicated to maintaining industry superiority .  you will be introduced to useful tools and resources that will help you grow both professionally and personally .  the ideal candidate must be able to work with multiple systems ,  communicate directly with internal and external customers at various organization levels ,  analyze and validate data ,  document processes and conduct various audits .  collaborates with management and process stakeholders to drive root cause resolution for problematic data ,  researches defective records and defines resolution plans under management supervision ,  the ability to communicate promptly and effectively as well as negotiate significant dispute resolutions is critical for success .    qualifications    a degree in accounting ,  finance ,  or business administration is preferred   3 . 0 gpa or higher preferred   the ability to effectively communicate and maintain close working relationships with various clients   strong written and verbal communication skills ,  high standard of personal performance ,  independent thinker ,  works effectively in dynamic ,  fast - moving ,  constantly changing environment   strong analytical ,  communication ,  leadership and presentation skills   demonstrated skills for business success ,  including project management ,  problem - solving ,  and the ability to diagnose and meet business demands   enthusiasm and eagerness to learn   highly proficient with ms office suite of products  ( word ,  excel ,  powerpoint )  if interested ,  please visit verizon . com / careers to review and apply to current opportunities .  you must create an application and apply in order to be considered .  the verizon staffing team will review your application for available entry - level finance opportunities at verizon .  if a possible match is identified ,  a recruiter will contact you to further discuss your skills and professional interests .    equal employment opportunity   we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .  job id  326139

on .  contributing your creative energy to high - impact projects from the moment you arrive .  and because we know the value of your education ,  we pay you for the talent and solutions you bring to the table .   in this summer internship program you will be offered an opportunity to be involved in meaningful work / projects  be exposed to daily operations  attend informational sessions  participate in networking activities with other interns ,  professionals ,  and business leaders .  you ll learn from the best minds in the industry and have a unique opportunity to use your knowledge and skills in an environment dedicated to maintaining industry superiority .  you will be introduced to useful tools and resources that will help you grow both professionally and personally throughout the program .   internships are available in  the following area     sales operations internship  ( retail sales ops )   qualifications    currently enrolled in a bachelors / masters degree program majoring in sales ,  business administration ,  marketing ,  it ,  management major preferred   must be currently enrolled in a full time degree program and returning to the program after the completion of the internship   gpa 3 . 0 or greater preferred   previous related work / internship experience preferred   strong analytical skills and solid communication skills   proficiency in microsoft office products   enthusiasm and eagerness to learn  start dates for these entry - level opportunities are typically in the spring / summer .   if a possible match is identified ,  a recruiter will contact you to further discuss your skills and professional interests .   equal employment opportunity  we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .   equal employment opportunity  we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .      
   responsibilities   the member of applications staff works as a member of the applications development team .  typically ,  the incumbent will require close supervision and a significant amount of training .  however ,  it is expected that the member of applications staff will increasingly demonstrate the ability to work independently .  works as a team member on small to intermediate size projects of low to average complexity .  works under the direction and supervision of senior applications staff and management .  completes assigned applications tasks on time  ( e . g .  ,  design ,  development ,  testing ,  maintenance ,  documentation ,  etc .  )  .  performs problem resolution activities according to established procedures and makes supervised decisions that impact assignments .  proactively communicates status reports and critical issues to manager .  successfully completes all relevant technical and professional training programs in accordance with performance agreement goals and objectives .  pos is a very diverse group catering to the provisioning & maintenance related transactions of a large section of the vzw user base .  it spans from our retail stores ,  to indirect verizon authorized sellers ,  to orders being placed by telesales reps ,  as well as large b2b orders .  we have evolved over the past few years ,  and have a fully functional & award winning pos mobile application that s been used extensively by the retail reps .  since most of the applications used are web based ,  we rely heavily on resources that are very knowledgeable in java / j2ee ,  jsp / servlets ,  java script ,  ajax ,  jquery ,  html 5 ,  css3 ,  velocity ,  json .  a sound knowledge of web services is essential to cater to our soa layer ,  through which we communicate to multiple systems within and outside vzw using rest and soap & xml over http   qualifications   bachelors degree in computer science / information systems and some experience in a client relations and / or hardware / software support position is preferred  or an equivalent combination of education and work experience technical aptitude ,  including the ability to understand detailed technical information pc literacy ,  including working knowledge of desktop applications  ( e . g .  ,  microsoft office ,  e - mail ,  etc .  )  b . s .  electrical / electronic / computer engineering ,  m . s .  preferred .  1 - 2 years experience with web - based applications ,  soa  ( services oriented architectures )  and web application servers  (  bea weblogic ,  websphere )  is desirable .  experience in web application development ,  mobile development  ( ios ,  android ,  windows )  ,  ajax ,  jquery ,  html 5 ,  css3 ,  velocity ,  json .  rest and soap based web services development is desirable .  1 - 2 years of development of ui applications which can port on mobile ,  desktop versions ,  spring ,  java persistence api  ( open jpa ,  hibernate ,  spring jdbc )  and mq is desirable .  sun certifications like scjp ,  scbd ,  scwcd would be preferred .  committed to learning to stay ahead of the curve user focused able to listen to business and user demands knowledge of industry best practices in web design ,  information design and usability .  competency in relational database structures and sql .  working knowledge of information systems concepts   equal employment opportunity   we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .  job id  312563

   responsibilities   verizon communications inc .  is a global leader in delivering broadband and other wireless and wireline communications services to mass market ,  business ,  government and wholesale customers .  a dow 30 company ,  verizon employs a diverse workforce of more than 194 , 000 and last year generated consolidated revenues of $106 . 6 billion .  the it auditor – data scientist will be part of an objective assurance and consulting team that is independently managed within verizon communications designed to add value and improve operations .  the internal audit team assists the audit committee of the board of directors and verizon management in accomplishing their objectives by bringing a systematic and disciplined approach to evaluate and improve the effectiveness of the overall control environment ,  risk management ,  and governance processes .  the internal audit staff gains extensive exposure to diverse aspects of verizon  s business .  these audit assignments include increasing levels of responsibilities and presentations to senior management ,  making internal audit an excellent place to work for high potential employees .  have you read malcolm gladwell  s books ?  or the string of other authors solving business challenges through data mining ?  are you interested in a path to becoming a data scientist ?  do you have what it take to develop great business acumen ?  leverage your critical thinking and problem solving skills while leveraging technical tools to analyze large complex data sets ?  if so then these responsibilities could be yours .  the it auditor – data scientist supports a high performance forensic and audit analytics team in its efforts to identify and drive data mining efforts through a risk based approach .  the enthusiasm in this position helps mitigate fraud ,  identify misconduct and control gaps utilizing data mining and analysis .  responsibilities include the following    passion for growth and learning new techniques with vigor and enthusiasm .  strong individual contributor with top notch team collaboration skills .  working with the team of six peers with over 70 years of data warehousing ,  programming ,  data mining ,  software design and project management experience .    strong ability to independently and proactively initiate projects ,  hypothesize business transaction flows and fraudulent scenarios .    design ,  extract ,  normalize ,  analyze ,  review and automate analysis for internal audit utilizing enterprise data warehouse ,  extracts and data mining tools  coordinate with business for outside data source requirements .    consolidates issues for management level review  develops clear written recommendations ,  which require minimal editing  presents recommendations and resolves issues with management   design ,  develop ,  maintain and communicate visual dashboards .    design and develop ad - hoc analysis based on business requirement needs .    identify and use appropriate investigative and analytical technologies to interpret and verify results .    coordinate with business to ensure follow - up and resolution of exceptions including specific individual resolution as well as root - cause analysis and control gap identification .    review large software implementations to identify transaction flow gaps ,  design flaws and data integrity issues .    actively participates in the completion of department initiatives to support the development of a best - in - class internal audit function .    maintain databases and related programs in a thorough and efficient manner .    take part in training courses to increase skill set and technical capabilities in order to better serve the needs of the analytics team .    qualifications    strong business analytical skills a must  ability to apply business logic to design and implement data mining techniques on large data sets .    projects with evidence of creative and critical thinking a must .    experience in using and managing forensic technologies ,  including data analysis tools .  highly proficient in one of the following  acl ,  idea ,  sql ,  excel or access .    understanding of data warehousing is a must .    experience designing ,  developing ,  implementing and maintaining a database and programs to manage data analysis efforts .    demonstrated ability to work independently and within a team in a fast changing environment with changing priorities and changing time constraints .    strong interpersonal skills and ability to multi - task .    ability to interpret business requests as well as communicate findings in a user - friendly manner .    bs / ba degree in management information systems ,  computer science ,  accounting ,  business ,  finance or related field .  masters degree a plus .  at least a 3 . 0 / 4 . 0 overall gpa or equivalent   requires an internship with related work experience  knowledge of technology ,  auditing ,  accounting ,  finance ,  or economics .  preferred qualifications   experience in normalizing data to ensure it is homogeneous and consistently formatted to enable sorting ,  query and analysis .    ability to write clear ,  concise reports and presentations with an ability to orally communicate effectively  organizational and documentation skills a must .    an understanding of risk management methodology and factors .    experience designing ,  developing ,  implementing and maintaining a database and programs to manage data analysis efforts .    consolidates issues for management level review  develops clear written recommendations ,  which require minimal editing  presents recommendations and resolves issues with management job id  314322     
 responsibilities  retail leadership development program  ( rldp )   operations  you’ll begin your journey at verizon wireless in a retail store operations role learning the essential skills for success ,  such as  voice products and data knowledge ,  inventory and financial controls ,  solid customer relationship development ,  accountability and compliance for customer transactions .   sales  after learning the essentials ,  you’ll be able to grow your earning potential in a sales position ,  where you’ll be responsible for  managing and exceeding quota / revenue targets ,  demonstrating equipment functions and network capability ,  proposing solutions that best benefit the company and the customer ,   ensuring customer satisfaction with every sale ,   retaining customer business ,  renewing contracts ,  presenting data solutions ,  and offering accessories designed to enhance the verizon wireless experience .   leadership  finally ,  you will have the opportunity to showcase your selling skills in a supervisory role .  here you’ll be required to  monitor daily store results to ensure sales ,  retention ,  and objective compliance ,  supervise ,  educate and motivate a team of sales reps .  to exceed quota goals ,  comply with necessary merchandizing requirements ,  complete monthly reporting and prepare for quarterly audits .   qualifications  our ideal candidate will bring the following qualifications   • bachelor’s degree in retail management /  business management  • leadership skills  ( student groups ,  internships ,  work ,  etc .  )   • minimum 3 . 0 gpa  • strong interpersonal ,  verbal ,  and communication skills  • proficiency in microsoft office suite  • ability to analyze customer needs ,  present solutions and add value through delivery of products and services  • work well in a fast - changing environment that requires a high degree of multi - tasking  • effective sales ,  negotiation and closing skills  • flexible work schedule ,  including nights and weekends  • ambition ,  energy ,  and a desire to achieve and succeed  • bilingual skills are a plus  if you’re ready to achieve and motivate others to do the same—a top performer looking to prove yourself—verizon wireless is the place for you .   equal employment opportunity  we are an equal opportunity employer m / f / d / v .

 job description  summary description  seasonal  ( oct 2013 to jan 2014 ,  specific dates may vary by site )  the fulfillment center medical representative will provide functions such as  provide functions such as first aid to injured or ill employees ,  proactively analyze tasks for potential safety issues ,  participate in the worker’s compensation process ,  and implement a site wellness program .   detailed description     provide triage ,  first aid and /  or referral to outside medical provider ,  if needed .    maintain all records of care given to employees .    maintain first - aid kits ,  inventory supplies ,  restock and clean equipment used in the care of employees .    contact outside medical providers as needed to schedule appointments ,  and if needed restriction clarification ,  or arrange further treatment .    train employee volunteers in first aid ,  cpr ,  aed ,  blood borne pathogen training .    provide daily end of shift reports to the safety and leadership team .    provide analysis of all incidents on a monthly basis coupled and make recommendations for risk reductions on work place injuries .    participate in weekly site case management review meetings with hr ,  risk management and safety .    participate in incident investigations as needed .    develop a return to work physical demands assessments for each task .    participates in facilitation of random drug testing .    establish an equipment inspection schedule and verify that the all equipment is being inspected by reviewing tags for compliance .    participate in the employee safety committee meetings .    evaluate stretching program assist safety with custom tailored stretching program ,  possibly through coordination with the off - site medical provider or physical therapy department .    meet and greet new hires during orientation .    be actively involved with site kaizens  ( process analysis and improvement project )    learn every job function in facility to fully understand the ergonomic risk factors   frequent floor time is required to better under the needs of operations .    help coordinate annual onsite health fair .    update the communication board with proactive health and wellness tips .   essential skills ,  knowledge and experience     ability to communicate safety needs at all levels of the organization .    strong analytical skills  analyze accident data ,  new processes ,  and machinery for potential safety concerns and conduct job hazard and job safety analyses .   basic qualifications    must have current and valid emt certification from the department of health for the state you are practicing in   must have a current and valid card evidencing successful completion of a cpr course at the basic life support for healthcare provider level  ( american heart association )  or professional rescuer  ( american red cross )    high school diploma or ged equivalent required   associate will be required to maintain all emt and cpr credentials throughout employment at amazon   proficiency in microsoft office   3 + years of experience as a full time emt responding to emergency calls  preferred qualifications    bachelor s degree   candidate must be certified to teach first aid ,  cpr ,  and aed   experience leading and managing a team .    experience with osha regulations specifically 29 cfr 1910     
 job description  enterprise sales representative would you like to be part of a team focused on increasing adoption of amazon web services by developing strategic accounts with the fortune 1000 ?  do you have the business savvy and the technical background necessary to help establish amazon as a key technology platform provider ?  as an enterprise sales representative you will have the exciting opportunity to help drive the growth and shape the future of an emerging technology .  your responsibilities will include driving revenue ,  adoption ,  and market penetration in enterprise accounts .   the ideal candidate will possess both a sales and technical background that enables them to drive an engagement at the cxo level as well as with software developers and it architects .  he / she should also be a self - starter who is prepared to develop and execute against a territory coverage plan and consistently deliver on quarterly revenue targets .  limited travel required .  exceptional selling skills via phone and webex required .   roles & responsibilities  · drive revenue and market share in a defined territory or industry vertical .  · meet or exceed quarterly revenue targets .  · develop and execute against a comprehensive account / territory plan .  · create & articulate compelling value propositions around aws services .  · accelerate customer adoption .  · maintain a robust sales pipeline .  · work with partners to extend reach & drive adoption .  · manage contract negotiations .  · develop long - term strategic relationships with key accounts .  · ensure customer satisfaction .  · limited travel .   -  exceptional selling skills via phone and webex required .   qualifications  · 7+ years of technology related sales or business development experience .  · ba / bs degree required .  · a technical background in engineering ,  computer science ,  or mis a plus .  · direct field experience in working with enterprise accounts .  · strong verbal and written communications skills .  · extensive customer network .      for more information on amazon web services ,  please visit http  /  / aws . amazon . com  basic qualifications    7 – 10 years of technology related sales or business development experience   ba .  .  .    a technical background in engineering ,  computer science ,  or mis a plus   direct field experience in working with enterprise accounts   extensive customer network  preferred qualifications    strong verbal and written communications skills     for more information on amazon web services ,  please visit http  /  / aws . amazon . com     li - br1 aws - sales - na     
 job description  at amazon ,  we strive to be earth’s most customer - centric company where people can find and discover anything they want to buy online .  we hire the world’s brightest minds ,  offering them an environment in which they can relentlessly improve the customer experience .  innovation and creativity are built into the dna of the company and are encouraged at all levels of employment .  every day we solve complex technical and business problems with ingenuity and simplicity .  we’re making history and the good news is we’ve only just begun .  amazon ,  one of the top 100 companies in the united states ,  has an immediate opening for a junior it technician in our fulfillment center .  fulfillment centers throughout the u . s .  handle millions of items from tens of thousands of vendors and ships them across the globe each day .  the successful junior it technician will be responsible for utilizing his / her skills to provide assistance to the operations team in resolving technical problems within the fulfillment center that cover a multitude of technical disciplines .  the junior it technician position is the first level of support for the operations of the fulfillment center and becomes the voice and face of the it department to our customers .  amazon seeks individuals who are willing to work hard ,  have fun ,  and join us in making worldwide history .  responsibilities include allocation and maintenance of it equipment throughout the fulfillment center .  this includes troubleshooting of all it related equipment such as pcs ,  wireless handheld devices ,  thin clients ,  printers and other end user devices .  junior it technicians are also responsible for the rma and repair process for all devices under warranty .  the junior it technician is a member of the larger it team within the fulfillment center and will specifically support the senior technicians in daily projects and activities as directed .  junior it technicians are also expected to participate in learning new technologies and career development opportunities as presented in an effort to progress to higher level positions within the it network .  all jr .  it positions will be on a rotation shift schedule between days and nights .  the position will also require supporting of multiple buildings around the area .  this position reports directly to the it manager for the fulfillment center .   amazon is an equal opportunity employer .   basic qualifications    understanding of basic computer / network concepts and terms   experience in microsoft office applications including but not limited to ms word ,  excel ,  power point ,  and outlook   excellent written and verbal communication skills   high school diploma or equivalent   stand / walk for 10 - 12 hours at a time   willingness to work flexible shifts and schedule including weekends ,  nights ,  and holidays   authorization to work in the u . s .  without sponsorship   must be highly self - motivated and customer - centric  preferred qualifications    experience troubleshooting thin clients ,  pcs ,  scanners ,  and portable handheld terminals   experience troubleshooting and maintaining laser printers and zebra printers .    inventory management skills   network + certification or equivalent experience / knowledge   a+ certified or equivalent experience / knowledge   1 - 3 years of experience working in a production environment   ability to manage multiple customer requests simultaneously   ability to prioritize work based on department and production objectives   willingness to relocate as business needs arise for career advancement opportunities     
 job description  amazon . com user experience design internships amazon is looking for talented ,  customer - focused user experience design interns to join our various company design teams .  this position requires strong organizational skills ,  passion for or experience with digital products ,  web expertise ,  and intrinsic design ability .  the ability to manage multiple projects and communicate with key stakeholders is essential .  placement of interns is determined by intern interest and business need .   amazon design internships help students gain real - world experience ,  build contacts ,  and learn from some of the best designers in the industry .  depending on intern’s interests ,  there will also be opportunities to shadow employees in related departments .   online portfolio of work is strongly encouraged  ( we will also accept pdf portfolios )  .   prerequisites  · provide online portfolio with resume ,  and as appropriate ,  printed materials · candidates must commit to 3 months ,  full time over the summer · selected candidates are required to come in for a friendly panel portfolio review with amazon designers  basic qualifications  basic qualifications  · 1 year minimum experience in a web production or classroom environment · currently enrolled in a 2 or 4 year design program at a university or community college  preferred qualifications  preferred qualifications  · demonstrated drive to pursue interaction or visual design · proficient in the adobe suite of software · familiarity with various working tools ,  such as axure · a grasp of the complexity of designing across multiple platforms · excellent attention to detail · strong communication skills · self - motivated and capable of working independently

offering them an environment in which they can relentlessly improve the customer experience .  innovation and creativity are built into the dna of the company and are encouraged at all levels of employment .  every day we solve complex technical and business problems with ingenuity and simplicity .  we’re making history and the good news is we’ve only just begun .   amazon ,  one of the top 100 companies in the united states ,  has an immediate opening for a junior it technician in our fulfillment center .  fulfillment centers throughout the u . s .  handle millions of items from tens of thousands of vendors and ships them across the globe each day .  the successful junior it technician will be responsible for utilizing his / her skills to provide assistance to the operations team in .   responsibilities include allocation and maintenance of it equipment throughout the fulfillment center .  this includes troubleshooting of all it related equipment such as pcs ,  wireless handheld devices ,  thin clients ,  printers and other end user devices .  junior it technicians are also responsible for the rma and repair process for all devices under warranty .  the junior it technician is a member of the larger it team within the fulfillment center and will specifically support the senior technicians in daily projects and activities as directed .  junior it technicians are also expected to participate in learning new technologies and career development opportunities as presented in an effort to progress to higher level positions within the it network .  all jr .  it positions will be on a rotation shift schedule between days and nights .  the position will also require supporting of multiple buildings around the area .  this position reports directly to the it manager for the fulfillment center .   amazon is an equal opportunity employer .   basic qualifications    understanding of basic computer / network concepts and terms   experience in microsoft office applications including but not limited to ms word ,  excel ,  power point ,  and outlook   excellent written and verbal communication skills   high school diploma or equivalent   stand / walk for 10 -  job description  work hard ,  have fun and make history with amazon’s legal team .  we are looking for a smart and motivated individual to provide administrative assistance to our amazon advertising and business development legal group .  responsibilities include drafting correspondence ,  coordinating agreement approvals and execution ,  tracking documents ,  maintaining status reports ,  word processing ,  performing general office tasks  ( such as calendaring ,  filing and budget tracking )  ,  and coordinating other legal and administrative matters with the business groups .   the successful candidate will possess the ability to work efficiently and independently  manage high volumes of tasks and projects with little guidance  react with appropriate urgency to situations and events that require a quick response or turnaround  take effective action without having to know the total picture  and think creatively and be proactive in solving problems that affect people within the group or other related groups .  the candidate will also be client - service oriented ,  have great attention to detail while still meeting tight deadlines ,  have great organization skills ,  and have the ability to easily switch gears .  a high level of professionalism ,  integrity ,  and discretion in handling confidential information ,  as well as the ability to work well with people at all levels inside and outside the company ,  is essential .   basic qualifications    the ideal candidate will have 3+ years experience as an administrative assistant .    knowledge of microsoft word is essential ,  and general comfort with learning new programs and software is a must .   preferred qualifications    strong written and oral communication skills are a must ,  as is the desire and aptitude for learning new concepts on the job .    the ideal candidate will have 3+ years experience as an administrative assistant .    legal administrative experience and a ba / bs are a plus but not required .   amazon is an equal opportunity employer     
 job description  amazon is looking for smart ,  analytical ,  customer - obsessed ,  and energetic undergraduates to help build a world - class shopping experience and serve as the leadership pipeline for our rapidly growing global retail business .  the retail undergraduate program is an ideal entry point to launch your career  we are dedicated to your success and provide all participants with a comprehensive onboarding experience and formalized training to supplement on - the - job learning .  undergrads also have access to career guidance and coaching on an ongoing basis .   as a part of the retail undergraduate program you may have end - to - end ownership of one of the many brands offered on amazon .  you may work across major functional areas such as ,  buying ,  inventory management ,  and online marketing to drive the performance of strategic vendor partners at amazon .   on a day - to - day basis you may manage revenue and profits ,  assist in negotiating for improved business terms ,  and optimize the supply chain to ensure products are available to customers .  in addition ,  you may be tasked with driving new customer acquisition and traffic through marketing initiatives that ensure customers can find what they want and what they never thought they needed .  we will provide you the amazon retail playbook as a starting point but will challenge you to come up with innovative and exciting ways to grow your business .   the program allows you to build a broad set of skills and prepares you for future leadership roles managing large ,  complex organizations and businesses .  you will be supported not only by leadership ,  but by a strong network of peers as well as tenured program participants hired through the retail undergraduate program .  the members of this community are enthusiastic and able to help you grow professionally while encouraging you to have fun in this fast - paced and exciting environment .  successful candidates will have amazonian dna  a bias for action  customer - centricity  flexibility  analytical ability  the drive to own ,  build ,  and grow  along with the ability to have a little bit of fun .   learn more about amazon’s values by reviewing our leadership principles .  please note  amazon is not able to offer visa sponsorship for this role .   amazon is an equal opportunity employer  work hard .  have fun .  make history .  join amazon  basic qualifications    currently enrolled in a bachelor’s degree program with a completed degree by july 2014   work ,  internship ,  or other leadership experience in a professional environment   computer skills ,  including microsoft office  ( i . e .  ,  excel ,  word )   preferred qualifications    top - tier academic performance at the undergraduate level   strong analytical skills   ability to deal with ambiguity   exceptional written and verbal communication   ability to break down and solve complex problems in a high - energy ,  fast paced environment   good organizational skills ,  including prioritization and time management

associates .   basic qualifications    high school diploma or ged equivalent   must have administrative experience such as data entry ,  managing data driven report processes or detailed processes  job description  are you looking to become a leader in a global operation with hundreds of managers and thousands of employees ?  would you like the challenge of delivering continuously improved customer experiences to over 150+ million customers ?  could you assume financial responsibility that impacts both the bottom line and shareholder expectations for a growing fortune 100 corporation ?  if you want to be involved in creating the future of online retail ,  and are dynamic ,  organized ,  and a self - starter join our operations team as an area manager .   amazon is looking for high potential graduates who are ready to do what it takes to be successful in the operations field and have your leadership capacity stretched to its full potential .  as front - line managers ,  you have an opportunity to develop a people - focused leadership style ,  while mastering the tools ,  processes ,  and operations that have created the most customer centric company on earth .   as an area manager ,  you will have the opportunity to manage and develop your own team of associates ,  drive process change at the ground level of our fulfillment centers ,  and learn how the largest online retailer in the world runs its operations .   you must also be authorized to work in the us without sponsorship .   key responsibilities     lead and develop a team of amazon associates   continuously improve processes and procedures   communicate policies to associates and act as the primary information source for the team ,  maintaining compliance and consistency and taking corrective action when needed   develop performance goals and objectives to achieve customer promise expectations and ensure accuracy and quality   support all safety programs and osha compliance to ensure a safe work environment for all associates   ensure procedures are followed for building security and product loss prevention   create ,  manage and support recognition and communication programs   partner with the management team to establish and maintain quality control standards  basic qualifications    a completed bachelor s degree is required with a graduation date between december 2013 and june 2014   willingness to work weekends and / or overnight shifts   willingness to work overtime both in peak season and as needed  preferred qualifications    degree in engineering ,  operations ,  supply chain ,  general management or a related field is a plus   ability to thrive in an ambiguous environment   adept at analytical work and the ability to motivate others in a deadline - driven environment   basic understanding of lean and six sigma  ( don’t know but anxious to learn ?  we’ll teach you !  )    strong interpersonal and communication skills  ( both written and verbal )    proven track record of taking ownership and driving results   the ability to dive deep into data and provide thought - provoking ,  workable business solutions  amazon’s us fulfillment centers are located nationwide .  plus ,  we’ll help you get there with relocation assistance .   for a full list of locations ,  visit amazon . com / ufulfill .  this position will likely not be in seattle .   amazon is an equal opportunity employer  www . amazonfulfillmentcareers . com
